page.title: 07FARM TRAIL DESCRIPTION(2)
page.content: THE FARM TRAIL DISPLAY IS A UNIQUE COLLECTION OF FARM AND WILD ANIMALS.ONE INTERESTING FEATURE IS THE GOTHIC LIBRARY,WHICH WAS PART OF THE OLD HOUSE.IT IS NOW AN EXHIBITION ROOM WHICH CONTAINS PHOTOGRAPHS AND WRITINGS ABOUT SIR GEORGE STAUNTON AND HIS TRAVELS.ANOTHER BUILDING OF INTEREST IS THE VICTORIA REGINA HOUSE WHICH IS NOW THE NURSERY.THERE ARE MANY BEAUTIFUL PLANTS AND SHRUBS AROUND THAT CREATE A NATURAL LOOK.THERE ARE MANY HORSES,CATTLE AND POULTRY IN THE TRAIL THAT ARE ALWAYS AFTER SOME FOOD WHICH YOU CAN BUY FROM THE SMALL CAFE.ICECREAM,SWEETS,DRINKS AND SOUVENIRS CAN BE BOUGHT FROM HERE AS WELL.IT IS IDEAL ON A SUMMER'S DAY WITH PLENTY TO SEE.ADULTS:70p CHILDREN:35p.
